name: Openwire Solutions
tag_list: it-services, software-consulting, openwire-solutions, outsourcing, offshoring, mobile-applications, enterprise-business-solutions, soa, opensource
overview:
Openwire is an IT Consulting Firm specializing in business solutions utilizing Enterprise Business Solutions, BI, Web 2.0, SOA, Open Source, Mobile application development and many more.

With more than 400+ customers and thousands of IT projects in Mobile, Open source, Web 2.0, and SOA under our belt, Openwire enables large and SME companies alike to leverage our one-of-a kind workforce of elite IT experts to create revenue generating business solutions.

Openwire has established strong footholds in fields of Offshore Dedicated Development Center, Application Development & Maintenance, Software as a Service, Enterprise Solutions, Product Development & Support, Game Development Mobile Solutions, Business Process Outsourcing, Testing Services, Multimedia Services and Search Engine Optimization.

The Core Service offerings are:

  1. Application, Product Development & Maintenance.

  2. Enterprise Business Solutions (SAP, CRM, Oracle, PeopleSoft etc).

  3. Business Intelligence & Analytics (Datawarehousing, Datamart, Data Integration etc).

  4. Mobile Applications (IPhone, Android, Blackberry, Symbian etc.)

  5. Web 2.0 Implementation & Consulting.

  6. Web designing & Maintenance.

  7. Open Source Consulting & Implementation.

  8. SOA and Web Services.

  9. Technical & Product support.

  10. SEO, Link exchange, Link building etc.

  11. Data entry, Form filling etc.

  12. Gaming, Digital media services etc.

  13. QA & Testing Services
